replies.body: Line sustain with a tanky build.
Not sure I follow what you are leading towards.  Can you provide more information on what you are looking to do or what problem you wish to solve?
Sustain with tanks against Ap and Ad champions  when they have  lot of damage then can oneshot u.
They are all situational, and of course, depend on the enemy team comp, your team comp and your champion.

You're not really explaining yourself here.  You need to actually say what the point of this thread is without very brief statements.  We just don't get it.

Items rarely have a "best" option, particularly when it comes to defense (rip force of nature).  It's all situational, and so knowing what champion you are playing and what champion you're in lane against is an important step.
Don't worry, not all forum ppl are like this. Most people understand what an item icon is and what "or" is
